metadata.name: Sleaze Castle: Director's Cut
metadata.description:
92 pages!
When her friend Panda mysteriously disappeared a year before, Jo Dribble could never have imagined that she had actually returned to her own planet - or that a bizarre accident involving a lamp-post, a lost astronaut and several blobby dimensions would leave her stuck on Panda's planet too! With a hungry zombie, a cute Oedipal anteater and a mysterious alien Prof to deal with, Jo's definitely having a bad day...
